sentences.sContent: She got a round of applause (=  a short period of applause  ) when she finished.
sentences.sCn: 她结束的时候获得一阵掌声。

sentences.sContent: ...Many listeners show applause not by clapping their hands but by waving them in the air...

remMethod.val: 来自applaud(v. 鼓掌欢迎； 称赞)， ap ＋ plaud(鼓掌)  → 鼓掌欢迎； 称赞

trans.tranOther: the sound of many people hitting their hands together and shouting, to show that they have enjoyed something
